Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 4/1/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1987, off Dave Stewart (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/17/1987, off Bob Sebra (NYM)...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/1988, hitting .625 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,364,286 through salary arbitration...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1989, hitting .420 with 6 HR, 21 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 8/22/1989...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,028,571 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/1990, hitting .650 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
